standards.title: Understands that people have to make choices between wants and needs and evaluates the outcomes of those choices.

components.description: Evaluate alternative approaches or solutions to current economic issues of Washington state in terms of costs and benefits for different groups.
Analyze the production, distribution, and consumption of goods, services, and resources in societies from the past or in the present.
Analyze how the forces of supply and demand have affected international trade in Washington state in the past or present.

components.description: Analyze the role of government in the economy of Washington state through taxation, spending, and policy setting in the past or present.

standards.title: Understands the economic issues and problems that all societies face.

components.description: Analyze the distribution of wealth and sustainability of resources in Washington state.
Explain the costs and benefits of trade policies to individuals, businesses, and society in Washington state.
